```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Read in the .csv file
```{r}
litters <- read.csv(file = "./data/FAS_litters.csv")
names(litters)

#change all variables names to snake_case using janitor::clean_names()
litters_data = janitor::clean_names(litters)
names(litters_data)

#explore teh dataset
str(litters_data)
```
